description: This file defines a Flutter widget screen for admin menu management in a healthy meal ordering app. It includes UI components such as headers, list items, and layout logic, with no application logic or data processing.

classes.name: AdminMenuManagementScreen
classes.description: StatelessWidget representing the admin menu management UI, including a header and list of placeholder items.

classes.name: _Item
classes.description: StatelessWidget for individual menu item display with icon and text styling.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the UI for the admin menu management screen, constructing headers, items, and layout based on responsiveness.
